product.product_title: Skechers Women's Go Walk Joy Cushioning Sneakers Shoes
product.cushioning: 5GEN midsole cushioning and high-rebound Goga Pillars provide lightweight, responsive, and energized comfort.
product.breathability: Breathable stretch-knit mesh upper allows for excellent airflow and a sock-like feel.
product.short_description: Discover the sensation of walking on clouds with the Skechers Women's Go Walk Joy Cushioning Sneakers Shoes. These slip-on walking shoes are the epitome of lightweight comfort and convenience, designed to keep you moving with ease all day long. Featuring a breathable, stretchable knit mesh upper, the Go Walk Joy conforms to your foot for a comfortable, sock-like fit that moves with you. The innovative slip-on design with a simple pull tab makes them incredibly easy to put on and take off. Underfoot, the shoe is powered by Skechers' proprietary 5GEN midsole cushioning, a lightweight and responsive material that provides exceptional shock absorption and energy return, propelling you forward with every step. The outsole features high-rebound Goga Pillars? that compress for added comfort and flexibility. Plus, the entire shoe is machine washable, ensuring easy care. For the ultimate in lightweight, cushioned, and convenient walking comfort, lace up (or rather, slip on) the Skechers Go Walk Joy.
product.about_this_item: SUPERIOR COMFORT AND SUPPORT: Experience premium cushioning with 5GEN technology and Goga Max high rebound insole... BREATHABLE DESIGN... EASY SLIP-ON STYLE... VEGAN FRIENDLY CONSTRUCTION... EASY CARE...
product.primary_keyword: walking shoes, slip on athletic shoes
